name: .SAS7BDAT
summary: Learn about .SAS7BDAT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: SAS7BDAT files are not meant to be opened. Instead, they are meant to be "imported" into SAS (Windows, Linux) via the application's libname command. For example, to access a SAS7BDAT file located at C:/​Documents/​example.sas7bdat, you would enter libname examplerefname C:/Documents/example.sas7bdat in your SAS session. You could then access the dataset by referring to it as examplerefname. For more detailed instructions, refer to SAS's official documentation.
